Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory248.png'}
{3: 'War has long since ravaged this city... Perhaps, for too long.'}
{3: 'The once prosperous and orderly city streets are now broken into dusty and disorderly ruins.'}
{3: 'After killing the last Corrupted in the barricade, Qu could finally take a breath as the remaining soldiers evacuated the heavy artillery.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'The 43rd barricade... The 6,903rd person.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "As for the other places... There's no point in rescuing them.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Because their channels have all been in radio silence.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'There were no oversights in command and our preparations were sufficient. But that did little to change the results...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Even so... The Kowloong people still needed this war.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: '"Without real pain, people do not recognize the choices they have to make."', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu flicks her glaive to the side, splattering the black ichor onto the broken wooden column beside her.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Connect me to Heng Ji.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'System Notice', 3: "Connected to Heng Ji's encrypted channel."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Begin the final preparations.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory67.jpg'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: "This is... Qu's data..."}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'What was Qu thinking... when she made this choice...?'}
{3: 'After a brief moment of hesitation, Huaxu sends the data to the output.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'And AI should not hesitate or doubt.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Let alone Huaxu.'}
